author: Peder Cox

comments.message: The advantage of this concept is that its easily deployable and movable as the situation changes.

description: The camp in a box concept was initally designed for security teams operating in remote and difficult regions of Africa. It is an ideal type of facility to allow health care workers a location to properly clean up and rest after long days of working with highly infectious patients. The facility is very easily adaptable to others functions such as administrative support, laboratory facility and if necessary into a very controlled access treatment facility.
summary: We have developed a rapidly deployable, rapidly movable 20 to 150 man Camp in a Box that can be moved in 20' containers, designed specifically for Africa and can be moved via  cargo aircraft to remote locations. The camp can be utilized as a health care provider life support facility,  mobile lab or administrative support facility. It comes complete with a 2.5 meter high perimeter wall and can be powered via generators or mobile solar power.
title: Camp in a Box
